group_1.textRight: Brace yourselves, everyone - the Witch will@be emerging shortly!

group_1.textLeft: Are you alright, Sayaka? You're out of breath...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I'm just worn out.

group_1.textLeft: You battle in the frontlines, drawing fire@from the Witch's attacks...
You're taking on a much bigger toll than@the rest of us.
Oh, I still have some Grief Seeds...

group_1.textRight: No, don't worry about it. I don't wanna@take too many...
Besides, I'm worried about burning through them@all when we don't even have an end in sight.

group_1.textLeft: That's true... We have no idea how many@Witches we have to defeat.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, exactly...

group_1.textLeft: Not knowing what to expect can be@really draining...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, exactly!
I swear, half of this exhaustion is psychological.
*Sigh*

group_1.textLeft: ...Sayaka, please just use the one I gave@you earlier.
I don't have enough to repay you yet...

group_1.textRight: ...That reminds me.
You said I gave you some Grief Seeds@before, right, Madoka?
After you told me that, I kept wracking@my brain, trying to remember.
At first, I figured I was just careless and forgot,
but now, I don't know if that's really the case.
I just can't remember that ever happening...
Are you sure it was me to begin with?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it was definitely you. You were really@in a tizzy, though...

group_1.textRight: Huh...? No, it still doesn't ring a bell.
Me giving away Grief Seeds,
even to you, isn't something I'd treat lightly...
Say, Madoka, what else do you remember?
If you can recall what you and Sayaka had talked@about, that might jog something in her memory...

group_1.textLeft: Sayaka seemed awfully flustered at the time.
I couldn't really follow along with what@she was saying...

group_1.textRight: Ah, so you were ignoring me...

group_1.textLeft: N-no, I wasn't! I'm trying to recall what@it was right now!

group_1.textRight: I don't get why you guys're chit-chatting now of all@timesâ€¦ But if you get your asses kicked while you@ain't lookin', it ain't my problem!
See, what did I tell you?! There's the Witch!
Right when Madoka is trying her best to@remember...!
We have to defeat the Witch first!
